casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. CITIZENS FOR RESPONSIBLE GREEN GOVT.
v.
GREEN 2018-1091 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 8, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus. This case shall not proceed pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.04 but shall instead proceed as an expedited election case pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.08. Respondents shall file their answer to the complaint within five days, and the parties shall otherwise comply with S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.08. All documents filed in this case shall be served as specified by S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.08(C).
